Class Button

  • java.lang.Object
    • greenfoot.Actor
      • Button

  • public class Button
extends greenfoot.Actor
    Button can be clicked on to do a specific thing. Buttons have two images, it changes when hovering over the button.
    Version:
    January 16th 2019
    Author:
    Kevin Biro

      Constructs the button with two images

      Checks mouse hover and changes the image to show depth

      Quits the game and goes to the menu

      Mutes the game and changes the images to show that it is muted and vice versa
